#include <stdio.h>
long long int a, b[1000005]={0},count=0;
int main(void) {
// your code goes here
long long int n;
scanf("%lld",&n);
long long int i, j;
for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
scanf("%lld", &a);
b[a]++;
}
for(i = 1; i <= 1000000; ++i) {

count += (b[i] * (b[i] - 1))/2;

}
n = (n * (n-1))/2 - count;
printf("%lld\n", n);
return 0;
}
